DIGITAL PRODUCT PASSPORT (TXT) — Lexmark B3442dw (near‑real)
============================================================================
1) PRODUCT IDENTIFICATION
-------------------------
Brand: Lexmark
Model: B3442dw
Function: Monochrome laser printer (single‑function)
Workgroup: Small workgroup
Serial: B3442DW-9C45B3287E

2) KEY SPECS (from Lexmark brochure/pages — verify)
---------------------------------------------------
Print speed: up to 42 ppm (regionally also quoted up to 40 ppm)
First page: as fast as ~5.9 s
Processor/memory: 1‑GHz dual‑core; 256 MB
Duplex: Automatic 2‑sided printing (standard)
Connectivity: Wi‑Fi, Ethernet, USB
Dimensions (H×W×D): ~222 × 368 × 363 mm (very compact)
Recommended monthly page volume: ~800–8,000 pages
Energy: ENERGY STAR® (see regional page)

3) MEDIA & HANDLING
-------------------
Included handling: 250‑sheet input + 100‑sheet multipurpose feeder; 150‑sheet output bin

4) TRACEABILITY
---------------
Internal serial: B3442DW-9C45B3287E

— END OF DOCUMENT —

DIGITAL PRODUCT PASSPORT (TXT) — Lexmark C4342 — Full Sample
============================================================================

IMPORTANT NOTE
--------------
This is an illustrative Digital Product Passport (DPP) in plain text for the
Lexmark C4342. It is **not** an official manufacturer document. Values marked
'verify' must be confirmed against the official datasheet and DoC before any
compliance use.

1) PRODUCT IDENTIFICATION
-------------------------
Brand: Lexmark
Model: C4342
Function: Color laser printer (single‑function)
Workgroup: Small/Medium (varies by configuration)
GTIN: 07012345678915
Serial number: LEX-C4342-E211BF3341
Manufacture date: 2025-06-15 (sample)
Batch / Lot: B20250615-86 (sample)
Country of origin: (enter country/plant)
SKU / Part numbers: (enter for your region)

2) MANUFACTURER & CONTACTS
--------------------------
Legal name: Lexmark International (sample)
Website: https://support.lexmark.com
Support: Online knowledge base & drivers (enter regional hotline)
EU authorised representative: (enter, if applicable)
Address: (enter legal address)

3) REGULATORY, SAFETY & COMPLIANCE (sample statuses)
----------------------------------------------------
CE Declaration of Conformity: Available via support portal (model-specific).
Applicable directives/standards (typical):
• Safety: EN 62368‑1
• Laser safety: EN 60825‑1
• EMC: EN 55032 (emissions), EN 55035 (immunity); EN 61000 series
• Ecodesign/ErP: (where applicable); RoHS (EU) 2011/65/EU; REACH (EC 1907/2006)
• WEEE 2012/19/EU — Separate collection symbol present

4) ENERGY & PERFORMANCE (illustrative; verify)
----------------------------------------------
Print speed (A4/Letter): 37–40 ppm (color/mono)
Print resolution: up to 1200 × 1200 dpi
First page out: ~6.0–6.5 s
Recommended monthly page volume: 1,500–10,500 pages
Duty cycle (max): (verify datasheet)
Duplex: Automatic 2‑sided printing
Typical energy: ENERGY STAR® certified (region dependent)
Noise/power modes: Quiet/eco modes; sleep and deep sleep

5) DIMENSIONS, MEDIA & CONNECTIVITY
-----------------------------------
Dimensions (H×W×D): 339 × 442 × 421 mm | Unboxed weight: ~20–21 kg
Media support: A6 to Legal; coated paper supported per specs
Interfaces: Gigabit Ethernet, USB; optional Wi‑Fi
Mobile & cloud: AirPrint / Mopria / Cloud print (region dependent); driver support per OS

6) MATERIALS & SUBSTANCES (indicative totals)
---------------------------------------------
Bill of materials (approx. % by mass; illustrative):
• Plastics ~45 %; Steel ~35 %; Electronics ~12 %; Elastomers ~4 %; Others ~4 %
Consumables:
• Unison™ CMYK toner; std/high/extra‑high yields
REACH Candidate List / RoHS:
• Compliant per manufacturer declarations; SDS for toner available upon request

7) SOFTWARE, CONNECTIVITY & CYBERSECURITY
-----------------------------------------
Security (typical): Color control policies; secure print; cert management; TLS/IPsec; optional pull print.
Firmware: Updatable via web UI/USB; verify signed firmware requirements
Protocols: IPv4/IPv6; SNMPv3; TLS 1.2+; 802.1X (varies by model)
Data: Print job data cleared per policy; storage encryption for HDD/flash (if equipped)

8) MAINTENANCE, REPAIR & SPARE PARTS
------------------------------------
Routine maintenance:
• Replace toner/drum/imaging units per life counters; clean rollers/paths
• Keep firmware current; review logs for errors
Field replaceables (typical): Toner, imaging unit/drum, fuser, rollers
Spare parts availability target: 5–7 years from end of production (brand policy dependent)

9) INSTALLATION & COMMISSIONING
-------------------------------
• Place on stable, ventilated surface; avoid high humidity/dust
• Connect network per IT policy; set admin password; disable unused services
• Load media within supported sizes/weights; calibrate color (for color models)

10) END‑OF‑LIFE (EoL) & CIRCULARITY
-----------------------------------
• Return used cartridges via manufacturer take‑back program (where available)
• Recycle printer via WEEE channels; remove consumables before transport
• Materials: plastics/steel/copper boards separated by recycler

11) ENVIRONMENTAL FOOTPRINT (illustrative)
------------------------------------------
Embodied carbon: dependent on BOM and manufacturing energy mix
Use‑phase note: emissions dominated by energy consumption and supplies usage
Packaging: recyclable corrugated; minimal foam where feasible

12) WARRANTY (example; enter your terms)
----------------------------------------
Standard: 1‑Year Advanced Exchange / Carry‑in (region dependent)
Extensions: 3–5‑year care packs available (enter SKUs)

13) TRACEABILITY & DATA CARRIER
-------------------------------
GS1 keys: GTIN 07012345678915, Serial LEX-C4342-E211BF3341, Lot B20250615-86
Digital Link (QR/NFC): https://support.lexmark.com (model page) + local asset tag

14) LINKED DOCUMENTATION (insert your URLs or files)
----------------------------------------------------
• Product page: (enter regional URL)
• Datasheet / User guide (PDF): (enter)
• Safety information & DoC: (enter)
• Supplies guide: (enter)
• Firmware release notes: (enter)

15) GOVERNANCE & VERSIONING
---------------------------
DPP issuer: Example DPP Generator (sample)
Version: 1.1
Created: 2025-09-01
Last updated: 2025-09-01
Data quality: Public sources + placeholders — replace 'verify' with official values.
Notes: Adapt fields to future EU DPP delegated acts for imaging equipment.

— END OF DOCUMENT —

DIGITAL PRODUCT PASSPORT (TXT) — Lexmark CX522ade (near‑real)
============================================================================
IMPORTANT: Compiled from Lexmark brochures/pages; specs vary slightly by region.

1) PRODUCT IDENTIFICATION
-------------------------
Brand: Lexmark
Model: CX522ade
Function: Color laser MFP (print/copy/scan/fax capable)
Workgroup: Small–medium workgroup
Serial: CX522ADE-AD1FA2D5C0

2) KEY SPECS (from Lexmark brochures/pages — verify)
----------------------------------------------------
Engine/CPU: 1.2‑GHz quad‑core; up to 6 GB memory
Print speed: up to 35 ppm (A4/Letter; some regions list 33 ppm)
Scan speed: up to 50 images per minute (simplex)
Display: 4.3‑inch (10.9 cm) color touch screen (e‑Task)
Duplex: Integrated 2‑sided printing
Input/Output: 250‑sheet input + 100‑sheet MPF / 150‑sheet output (typical)
Interfaces: Gigabit Ethernet; USB 2.0 host (front) + USB 2.0 device; optional Wi‑Fi
Dimensions (H×W×D): ~462 × 442 × 588 mm | Weight: ~27.1 kg
Energy/eco: ENERGY STAR; many regions list EPEAT Silver
Recommended monthly volume: ~1,500–8,500 pages (typical listing)

3) SECURITY & SOFTWARE
----------------------
Security: Lexmark full‑spectrum security; network protocols incl. 802.1X, TLS, IPsec (see datasheet)
Apps: e‑Task apps; mobile printing supported via AirPrint/Mopria/etc. (region dependent)

4) COMPLIANCE
-------------
EU/Int’l safety/EMC as per EU DoC; laser safety EN 60825‑1; safety EN 62368‑1.

5) SUPPLIES (examples; vary by SKU)
-----------------------------------
Unison™ toner yields: std and high‑yield black/color; CMY yields commonly 1,400+ pages;
black standard ~2,000 pages; see supplies guide for exact codes.

6) TRACEABILITY
---------------
Internal serial: CX522ADE-AD1FA2D5C0

— END OF DOCUMENT —

DIGITAL PRODUCT PASSPORT (TXT) — Lexmark MS521dn (near‑real)
============================================================================
IMPORTANT: This is a practical DPP-style summary compiled from Lexmark sources.
Verify against the official Lexmark datasheet/DoC for compliance use.

1) PRODUCT IDENTIFICATION
-------------------------
Brand: Lexmark
Model: MS521dn
Function: Monochrome laser printer (single‑function)
Workgroup: Medium workgroup
Part number (example): 36S0300 / regional variants
Serial: MS521DN-D93B31CA44

2) KEY SPECS (sourced from Lexmark brochure & site — verify region)
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Print speed: up to 46 ppm (A4/Letter)  | First page: ~6.0 s
Recommended monthly page volume: 2,000–15,000 pages
Print resolution: up to 1200 x 1200 dpi (1200 IQ options)
Memory: 512 MB
Input/Output: 350‑sheet in (250 + 100 MPF) / 150‑sheet out (std.); up to 2,000‑sheet with options
Duplex: Integrated 2‑sided printing
Connectivity: Gigabit Ethernet, USB 2.0 (Type‑B); optional Wi‑Fi via adapter
Media sizes: A6 to Legal (incl. envelopes)
Dimensions (H×W×D): 260 × 399 × 374 mm | Weight: ~14.1 kg
Typical supplies: Unison™ toner up to 10,000 pages (ISO/IEC) (varies by SKU)

3) ENERGY & ENVIRONMENT
-----------------------
Energy: ENERGY STAR® (see regional product page), auto‑duplex default
User replaceables: long‑life imaging components (per Lexmark materials)
Noise & power: see datasheet; uses power‑save/sleep modes

4) COMPLIANCE (EU/Int’l) — see DoC for your SKU
-----------------------------------------------
Safety: EN 62368‑1; Laser: EN 60825‑1; EMC: EN 55032/55035; Ecodesign/ErP as applicable
EU Declaration of Conformity: available from Lexmark support site (model MS521dn).

5) MATERIALS & CONSUMABLES
--------------------------
Imaging system: Unison™ toner; return program cartridges available
Cartridge yields: up to ~10k pages mono (ISO/IEC) (model dependent)
Packaging: recyclable corrugated; prints on mixed papers (60–216 g/m²)

6) SERVICE, SECURITY & MAINTENANCE
----------------------------------
Security: Lexmark full‑spectrum security (network/authentication features)
Warranty: 1‑Year Advanced Exchange (region dependent)
Maintenance: keep firmware updated; periodic cleaning; replace consumables as indicated

7) DIMENSIONS / LOGISTICS (approx.)
-----------------------------------
Unboxed size (H×W×D): 260 × 399 × 374 mm
Unboxed weight: ~14.1 kg
Packaged size: ~376 × 430 × 470 mm

8) TRACEABILITY
---------------
Internal asset/serial: MS521DN-D93B31CA44
QR/Digital Link (example): https://support.lexmark.com (model support landing)

— END OF DOCUMENT —
